  Project:  Thinkpipes  (Award  Winning  Advisory  Platform)  Project  Details:   A  powerful,  innovative  platform  designed  to  help  advisors  trade  the  way  they  want. 
Module  Responsibilities:  ➔  Architecturing  /  developing  a  cutting-edge  AI-powered  system  that  will  revolutionize  how  Trade  Desk  personnel  and  financial  advisors  operate,  also  to  help  advisors  making  decisions.   This  will  leverage  powerful  multi-modal  Large  Language  Models  (LLMs),  this  will  be  further  augmented  with  Retrieval-Augmented  Generation  (RAG),  ensuring  real-time  access  to  a  constantly  updated  knowledge  base  of  market  data,  internal  documentation,  and  relevant  external  sources.  This  will  also  use  function  calling  to  seamlessly  interact  with  external  platforms,  automate  workflows  (like  querying  data,  placing  orders,  generating  reports),  and  execute  actions  based  on  advisors  requests.  ➔  Working  on  modernization  of  ThinkPipes,  transform  the  current  monolithic  to  microservices  in  GCP   ➔  Working  on  Thinkpipes  Routers  ,  Listeners  to  have  low  latency  trade  communication  via  Fix  Protocol  (Fix  Messages,  Fix  Gateway)  ➔  Performing  Service,  DB  (Oracle  to  Postgres)  migration  POCs  into  AWS  ➔  Handling  team  of  20  engineers  both  onsite  and  offshore.  ➔  Leading  the  recruitment  of  4  lead  engineers  onsite  and  25  engineers  offshore.  Environment:  Java  8,  Microservices,  Kafka,  Kubernetes,  RMI,  Oracle,  Postgres,  Fix  Protocol,  Google  Cloud  Platform  (GCP)  Client: All  major  institutional  investors
